product_name: University Games Man Bites Dog Card Game
long_description: The compact University Games Man Bites Dog card game offers hours of hilarious entertainment while traveling or at home. Create zany headlines that earn big points-and big laughs! Each Headline card holds a point value-accumulate points by creating headlines with the cards you are dealt; if you are the first player to reach 500 points, you win! The University Games Man Bites Dog card game comes with 106 Headline cards, 3 Exclusive cards and instructions.
short_description: The compact University Games Man Bites Dog card game offers hours of hilarious entertainment while traveling or at home. Create zany headlines that earn big points-and big laughs!
